Straightshot nods and waddles off into the Ark to do what she was programme=
d to do, before actually becoming a genuine warrior.  She had always loved =
communications and was hoping that with all her spark, she could get a hold=
 of other Autobots or Maximals that may still be outside the parameter of O=
ld Earth or somewhere on the planet on a distant shore.  She climbs up to a=
 chair, and with tiny paws, she programs the computer for long range commun=
ication output.   All the while, transmitting on Autobot frequency.  

" Th=
is is Ark control, to all Autobot and Maximal kind.  My ID is Straightshot,=
 Maximal, formally known as an Autobot, over.  I am here with Rodimus, Leo =
and Tucson Prime.  We are in need of dire assistance.  Decepticon and Preda=
con forces are more than outnumbering our forces.  And now we have the thre=
at of Unicronian Kind on the verge of plotting a destructive raid on this p=
lanet,which is Old Earth.  We are striving to protect it but, we aren't eno=
ugh.  We need help, please reply, over.."

Her eyes sparkle as hope of cont=
acting others grows deeper within her spark.

Meanwhile, Tucson could see w=
hat was happening with his sister.  He sits down next to her with a gentile=
 hand on her shoulder, minding her quills as he does so.  

" Don't worry, =
someone will reply.  Your message was candid and clear.  And any Maximal or=
 Autobot that's out there, will reply to you.  Keep trying, your voice is v=
aluable, and that's what we need now, a voice. "

Straightshot looks up to =
him and gives him a hug.  He returns it with one of his own.

" Thanks, I n=
eeded that. "

He chuckles.

" That's what big brothers are for. "

He gets=
 up and rubs her head.

" I'll let you get back to work.  I better start do=
ing my share too.  All right Rodimus needs me.  All right Talon, time to ge=
t moving....  Aahhh Aahhhcoo!"

Without warning a blast of energon is dispe=
rsed.
Straightshot turns in surprise.

" Whoah! Aww scrap!  NOT YOU TOO?!  =
First Uproar, now you got it.  Stanton, Bump, got another patient for isola=
tion for ya..  Tucson's got the virus too."

Nightshift is startled by his =
big buddie's sneeze.

" Scrap! What was that!?"

Quickstride sighs.

" Tucs=
on, he caught Uproar's bug."

Another sneeze rattles the floor a slight.

"=
 Sorry, sorry, that just slipped... AHHCHOO!  Sorry again."

Now in beast m=
ode, Tucson tries to shake it off but is no match to a series of sneezing f=
its.

Local artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and d=
igital media.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occa=
sion!  

Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me at=
 this address and we will talk.  

On May 4, 2012, at 12:34 PM, Super Cyclo=
nus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Tucson looks to Rod=
imus, as he takes Lord Elder's question into heart.
> >
> > " Lord Elder br=
ings up a good point. We need to find out what's going on
> > with the Pred=
acons and find out what those Humans were up to. I'm wondering
> > if these=
 events are connected to each other. Windlord, Perceptor, I entrust
> > you=
 with the task of gathering the intel we need about the Predacons and the
>=
 > Humans. Rodimus and I will begin our survey of the parameters and see wh=
at
> > we come up with. And by the way, Talon will be flying with me, of co=
urse."
> >
> > His arm does not let go of Talon, as he embraces her gently.=

> >
> > Straightshot nods and looks up to Leo Prime.
> >
> > " If ya want,=
 I can continue trying ta contact the others. I'm sure
> > someone's out th=
ere, there has ta be."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> "Sure, if you want to try feel free.=
" LEO PRIME He said as he gestured
> at the Ark.
> 
> WING CALIBER walked o=
ver, "I will help." He said comfortingly. "It is
> not as if there is no on=
e, we have the fuzors and we have us here,
> Rodimus Primal, Tucson Prime, =
Big Convoy, Polar Claw and his team. "He
> shook his head sadly. "But we ha=
ve lost so many in recent times."
> 
> Yes, they had three Primes and a Con=
voy among their number but there
> were also the missing, three of which we=
re: OPTIMUS PRIMAL, RHONOX,
> and CHEETOR.
> 
> Where were they, and would =
finding them be enough to turn the tide?
> 
> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift st=
ops to try and scratch at the strange metallic rash on his leg.
> > Quickst=
ride nudges his head away from the metallic wound like object.
> >
> > "No,=
 stop that! Bump and Stanton are right. That could be very dangerous
> > to=
 your body."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> BUMP and SANTON walk on either side of NIGHTSH=
IFT, "Come on, to the
> infirmary with you." BUMP said.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> - P=
reston

      <p>> <OLD><br>
><br>
> Tucson lo=
oks to Rodimus, as he takes Lord Elder's question into heart.<br>
><br>
=
> " Lord Elder brings up a good point.  We need to find out what's going=
 on<br>
> with the Predacons and find out what those Humans were up to. =
 I'm wondering<br>
> if these events are connected to each other.  Windl=
ord, Perceptor, I entrust<br>
> you with the task of gathering the intel=
 we need about the Predacons and the<br>
> Humans. Rodimus and I will be=
gin our survey of the parameters and see what<br>
> we come up with.  An=
d by the way, Talon will be flying with me, of course."<br>
><br>
> H=
is arm does not let go of Talon, as he embraces her gently.<br>
><br>
&g=
t; Straightshot nods and looks up to Leo Prime.<br>
><br>
> " If ya w=
ant, I can continue trying ta contact the others.  I'm sure<br>
> someon=
e's out there, there has ta be."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
"Sure, if yo=
u want to try feel free." LEO PRIME He said as he gestured<br>
at the Ark.<=
br>
<br>
WING CALIBER walked over, "I will help." He said comfortingly. "It=
 is<br>
not as if there is no one, we have the fuzors and we have us here,<=
br>
Rodimus Primal, Tucson Prime, Big Convoy, Polar Claw and his team. "He<=
br>
shook his head sadly. "But we have lost so many in recent times."<br>
<=
br>
Yes, they had three Primes and a Convoy among their number but there<br=
>
were also the missing, three of which were: OPTIMUS PRIMAL, RHONOX,<br>
a=
nd CHEETOR.<br>
<br>
Where were they, and would finding them be enough to t=
urn the tide?<br>
<br>
> <OLD><br>
><br>
> Nightshift stops =
to try and scratch at the strange metallic rash on his leg.<br>
> Quicks=
tride nudges his head away from the metallic wound like object.<br>
><br=
>
> "No, stop that!  Bump and Stanton are right.  That could be very dan=
gerous<br>
> to your body."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
BUMP and SANTO=
N walk on either side of NIGHTSHIFT, "Come on, to the<br>
infirmary with yo=
u." BUMP said.<br>
